mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_type, permission_path, description, parent_id, sort, status, icon, component, is_external, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_permission ( permission_name, permission_code, permission_type, permission_path, description, parent_id, sort, status, icon, component, is_external, create_time, update_time, deleted ) VALUES ( #{permissionName}, #{permissionCode}, #{permissionType}, #{permissionPath}, #{description}, #{parentId}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{icon}, #{component}, #{isExternal}, NOW(), NOW(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_permission SET permission_name = #{permissionName}, permission_code = #{permissionCode}, permission_type = #{permissionType}, permission_path = #{permissionPath}, description = #{description}, parent_id = #{parentId}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, icon = #{icon}, component = #{component}, is_external = #{isExternal}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE sys_permission SET deleted = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_code = #{permissionCode} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_permission WHERE deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_type = #{permissionType} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT p. FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.deleted = 0 AND rp.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p. FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted = 0 AND rp.deleted = 0 AND ur.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sort ASC, create_time DESC
